description: Improve documentation to meet OSS best practices

partial: 1.9 External docs (docs/ exists but not a proper site)

tasks.name: Add standard badges to README
steps: Add CI status badge from GitHub Actions
Add license badge (linking to LICENSE.md)
Add crates.io version badge (placeholder until published)
Add docs.rs badge (placeholder until published)
Place badges at top of README after title
acceptance_criteria: README.md has 4+ badges at the top

tasks.name: Document 5+ installation methods
steps: Document shell installer (curl)
Document cargo install from git
Document cargo install from crates.io (when published)
Document cargo-binstall method
Document GitHub Releases download
Add platform-specific notes (Windows, macOS, Linux)

tasks.name: Add logo/branding to README
steps: Create or source a simple logo for common-repo
Add logo to assets/ or docs/assets/ directory
Reference logo at top of README.md
Ensure logo looks good in both light and dark mode

tasks.name: Audit and improve rustdoc coverage
steps: Run cargo doc --document-private-items to generate docs
Review each public module for documentation
Add missing summary lines to all public items
Add examples to key functions and structs
Ensure error types are documented
acceptance_criteria: All public items have rustdoc comments
tasks.completion_notes: Audit found excellent documentation coverage. All public items have rustdoc comments. Key functions in git.rs, path.rs, cache.rs, filesystem.rs have Examples sections. cargo doc generates without warnings even with -D warnings.

tasks.name: Sync README with crate docs using include_str!
steps: Review lib.rs module-level documentation
Use #![doc = include_str!("../README.md")] or similar pattern
Ensure markdown renders correctly in docs.rs
Test with cargo doc
acceptance_criteria: lib.rs uses include_str! to include README content

tasks.name: Add FAQ/troubleshooting documentation
steps: Review common issues from development
Create docs/troubleshooting.md or add FAQ section to README
Document common error messages and solutions
Add troubleshooting for Git authentication issues
Link FAQ from main README

tasks.name: Set up external documentation site
steps: Choose mdBook or mkdocs-material for docs
Configure docs site in docs/ directory
Set up GitHub Pages workflow for deployment
Migrate existing docs/* content to site structure
Add navigation and search
acceptance_criteria: GitHub workflow deploys to GitHub Pages

notes: Priority 1 items should be completed first (quick wins)
Logo creation may require user input or external design
docs.rs publication depends on crates.io publication
